p: The epidemic occurred in 3 phases ( Figure 1): an early phase (21 days in February‒March 2013), during which 24 animals became ill and 1 infant died; a middle phase (22 days in May‒June 2013), during which 40 animals became ill and 4 adults died; and a late phase (19 days in August‒September 2013), during which 31 animals became ill and none died. Of the ≈56 chimpanzees in the community at the beginning of 2013, five died during the outbreak (1 infant 2.2 years of age and 4 adults 24.0‒57.9 years of age), for an overall mortality rate of 8.9%.
